description: Specifies whether a control is currently enabled or disabled in each enabled standard in the calling account. This operation omits standards control associations for standard subscriptions where StandardsControlsUpdatable has value NOT_READY_FOR_UPDATES.

parameters.name: SecurityControlId
parameters.description: The identifier of the control (identified with SecurityControlId, SecurityControlArn, or a mix of both parameters) that you want to determine the enablement status of in each enabled standard.

nested_items.name: StandardsControlAssociationSummaries
nested_items.description: An array that provides the enablement status and other details for each security control that applies to each enabled standard.

nested_items.name: StandardsArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a standard.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlId
nested_items.description: A unique standard-agnostic identifier for a control. Values for this field typically consist of an Amazon Web Services service and a number, such as APIGateway.5. This field doesn't reference a specific standard.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a control, such as arn:aws:securityhub:eu-central-1:123456789012:security-control/S3.1. This parameter doesn't mention a specific standard.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The enablement status of a control in a specific standard.

nested_items.name: RelatedRequirements
nested_items.description: The requirement that underlies this control in the compliance framework related to the standard.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The last time that a control's enablement status in a specified standard was updated.

nested_items.name: UpdatedReason
nested_items.description: The reason for updating a control's enablement status in a specified standard.

nested_items.name: StandardsControlDescription
nested_items.description: The description of a control. This typically summarizes how Security Hub evaluates the control and the conditions under which it produces a failed finding. The parameter may reference a specific standard.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination parameter that's included in the response only if it was included in the request.
